title: Tassel, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Pear-shaped linen tassel, braided and knotted. Short double loops attached to pear-shaped center from which hang four longer and four shorter units with a longer unit in center terminating in small base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel, late 16th–early 17th century.
late 16th–early 17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-7.
